summary: Request to add the first execution run ID to workflow info in the Ruby SDK, as part of a cross-SDK feature initiative.
userImpact: Users will be able to access the original run ID from workflow execution information for tracking and debugging purposes.
proposedFix: Add first execution run ID field to workflow info structure, following the feature specification referenced in temporalio/features#29
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented as part of cross-SDK enhancement effort
keyQuote: Add first execution run ID to workflow info
